AzureOpenAI.Endpoint: <Your Azure OpenAI endpoint URL, e.g., https://your-resource.openai.azure.com>
AzureOpenAI.DeploymentName: <Name of your OpenAI model deployment, e.g., gpt-4o>
AzureOpenAI.EmbeddingsDeploymentName: <Name of your embeddings deployment, e.g., text-embedding-ada-002>

AzureAISearch.Endpoint: <Your Azure Cognitive Search endpoint URL, e.g., https://your-search-service.search.windows.net>
AzureAISearch.KnowledgeSourceName: <Name of your knowledge source, if used>
AzureAISearch.KnowledgeAgentName: <Name of your knowledge agent, if used>
